title: Diabetes Self-Test
description: A user-friendly web application that predicts the likelihood of diabetes based on personal medical information, providing quick and accessible results.

title: TextScape
description: TextScape displays a 3D map of text chunks based on their semantic similarityâ€”use the filters and search to explore related content, and click any point to view or download the underlying text.

title: Victorian Simplicity
description: Victorian Simplicity is an exhibition website designed to capture and display a counter-narrative of the Victorian Era, namely that it was a simple time.
